description: Surrealist image of animals (primarily elephants), figures and machines on winding elevated paths; primarily reddish-pink ground; collage, drawn and painted elements; machine (printing press?), LRC; people painting, LLC; central greenish tower with cat; architectural elements; some ink stamped elements
marks: Signature, Title and Date LRC, in black: [DORMAN \'14]; on back, in black: [J
medium: Ink, acrylic and antique paper on panel
title: Red Roil
